        public static java.lang.String rand(java.lang.String chooseFrom,
                                    int length,
                                    boolean unrepeatable,
                                    boolean ignoreCase)
        generate a random string serial with characters from $chooseFrom and given length.
        Parameters:
        chooseFrom - characters to choose from
        length - generated serial length
        unrepeatable - true if the serial doesn't contain repeating characters. false otherwise.
        ignoreCase - true if the serial doesn't contain repeating case-ignored characters. false otherwise.
        Only consider this argument when $unrepeatable is true
        Returns:
        random string serial
